name: scaled_pulses_20240302
description: The goal of this experiment is to try a weighted combination of pulses on real hardware. The combination is between a constant pulse and an optimized one. This configuration specifies how to retrieve the optimized pulse, which hardware to use, and which linear combinations (scalings) should be tried.

optimized_pulse.description: This configuration makes it possible to load the pulse optimized for an X gate with theta=pi, where the basis of the pulse is a Fourier series with constrained ends. The name of the run will be used to retrieve the results of the optimization.
